title: Moderation of "Golden Rule", specifically regarding Rioters
body:
Effective immediately, we will be moderating the Boards to more closely reflect our original intentions of the "Golden Rule". As per the [Boards Universal Rules](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules):

> Always be respectful to players, community members, moderators, and Rioters. Harassment and insults will not be tolerated (“just playing” is NOT a catch-all excuse).

We understand that there are certain topics you're passionate about, and we've been able to see time and time again that game balancing is one of those topics. Historically, we've been relatively lenient on these types of comments, as we didn't want to stifle criticism. Today, we are putting our foot down and ensuring that everyone on the Boards, Rioters and players alike, are treated with respect. Folks who engage in harassment against another will be given a warning, and repeated attempts to harass players will result in suspensions.

If you have something to say, you can do so respectfully.

If this is the extent of it, we'd probably just remove it since it doesn't actually contribute to the discussion and only furthers the negativity and perception of the Boards as a negative place. If you add meaningful context and use it as a hyperbole, I'd imagine it'd be fine.
What if someone literally thinks the balance team should lose their jobs and provides support with examples of balancing issues?
If you can respectfully portray it, then so be it. Use your best judgment to ensure that it doesn’t overstep into disrespect, and I’d say try to be constructive.
